All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddEditEventFragment
Fragment for adding/editing an event
AddEventFragment
A Fragment for adding new events to the Firestore database.
Administrator
Initializes a user that has administrative permissions.
Attendee
Represents an attendee of an event.
AttendeeAddCallback
Callback interface for attendee add operations.
AttendeeController
Manages operations related to attendee management within a Firestore database.
AttendeeFetchCallback
Callback interface for attendee fetch operations.
AttendeeUpdateCallback
Callback interface for attendee update operations.
Capture
Empty Class that aids in scanning and allows us to manipulate the activity design in the manifest file
EditEventFragment
This is the fragment related to handling operations involving Editing existing events in the database
EditProfileFragment
Fragment for editing and updating user profile information.
Event
Base class for events, contains all event data.
EventController
Handles operations related to event management in a Firestore database.
EventDetailsFragment
Fragment for displaying event details.
EventFetchByUserCallback
Callback interface for event fetch (by user) operations.
EventFetchCallback
Callback interface for user fetch operations.
EventPageFragment
Fragment for displaying a list of events.
ImageController
Controller class for managing image uploads and retrievals with Firebase Storage.
MainActivity
 
ProfileFragment
Fragment for displaying and managing user profile information.
QrCodeController
Handles QR Code generation and aids in storing QR Codes
QrScannerController
Handles QR Code scanning and adding events using QR codes or checking in
RoleSelectFragment
Fragment controlling user role selection screen
SignupFragment
Fragment controlling user sign up screen
User
Initializes a user with a username, first name, and last name.
UserAddCallback
Callback interface for user add operations.
UserController
Manages user data interactions with a Firestore database, including adding, updating, and fetching user details.
UserFetchCallback
Callback interface for user fetch operations.
UsernameCheckCallback
Callback interface for username check operations.
UserUpdateCallback
Callback interface for user update operations.
